Depart by Coach and Return trip by River Sun Cruise About 70 km north of Bangkok, Ayuthaya was the second ancient capital of Siam. Founded on 03 April 1350 and ended on 7 April 1767, Ayuthaya had a long history of 417 years. Take an air-conditioned coach to explore the Bangpa-In Summer Palace and the magnificent temples in Ayutthaya. Enjoy a fascinating river cruise trip back to Bangkok with International buffet lunch on board.
